articles.description: England host Australia in the third men’s one-day international at Seat Unique Riverside – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs Australia LIVE: third men’s ODI – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Follow live text updates from four matches in the third round of the EFL Cup and listen to radio commentary of Wycombe Wanderers taking on Aston Villa.
articles.title: EFL Cup LIVE: four matches from the third round, including Man City v Watford & Chelsea v Barrow - scores, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: Brett Favre, one of the NFL's greatest quarterbacks, reveals he has Parkinson's disease.
articles.title: Brett Favre Parkinson's diagnosis: Three-time NFL MVP reveals he has disease

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says his side's tactics in Sunday's 2-2 draw against Manchester City were "normal".
articles.title: Mikel Arteta defends Arsenal's tactics during 2-2 draw with Manchester City

articles.description: Uefa have re-opened the bidding for stadiums to host the 2027 Champions League final after the match was stripped from AC Milan.
articles.title: Champions League: Uefa re-open bidding for stadiums for 2027 final

articles.description: England bowler Mark Wood says he has been told to “stop picking his kids up” with his right arm because of his elbow injury.
articles.title: England bowler Mark Wood says he cannot pick his children up because of elbow issue

articles.description: Nottingham Forest captain Morgan Gibbs-White, manager Nuno Espirito Santo and Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler are charged by the Football Association following their red cards in Sunday's Premier League match.
articles.title: Morgan Gibbs-White, Nuno Espirito Santo and Fabian Hurzeler charged by FA for red cards

articles.description: Red Bull head of race strategy Will Courtenay will leave the team after 14 years in the role to join McLaren as sporting director.
articles.title: Red Bull head of race strategy Will Courtenay to leave team for McLaren

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says he has to be "trusted" over his reasons for dropping Marcus Rashford against Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says he has to be 'trusted' over reasons for dropping forward

articles.description: Joe El-Abd closes in on an agreement to replace Felix Jones as England defence coach.
articles.title: Joe El-Abd close to finalising deal to become England defence coach
